verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For the battle is won
By lifting Jesus
Higher in the midst of thee,
Joy, joy, joy is the victory.
For the battle is won
By lifting Jesus
Higher in the midst of thee,
Sing and shout the victory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So let us sing, sing for joy,
Sing, sing for joy,
Sing, sing for joy,
Sing for joy to the Lord, all the earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So let us ... clap, shout, dance, praise etc.
